item.title: I'm Convinced The MCU Just Found The Sneakiest Way To Give Its Newest Team Their Own Version Of The Avengers' Hulk
item.description: The MCU looks set to be introducing a number of new teams in the near future, and the next of these seem to have a perfect stand-in for the Hulk.

item.title: Robert Pattinson Finally Realizes Where He Got His Mickey 17 Accent From, & It's Based On A Performance In Oscar-Winning Movie
item.description: Robert Patterson reveals his distinct accent for Bong Joon-ho's Mickey 17 were based on characters from an award-winning Coen brothers 1996 film.

item.title: 10 Oldest Marvel Movie & Show Releases Of All Time
item.description: Marvel movies and TV shows have been around long before the Marvel Cinematic Universe, with the company having a lengthy live-action history.
